title: Thermal Management of Power Devices: Augmented Reality-Based Experimental Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: AR experimental environment setup using digital devices (tablets/smartphones), with group activities in teams of four

learning_goals: Learners can explain thermal generation mechanisms of power devices through 3D visualization via AR platforms
Learners can evaluate thermal management strategies (heat sink/fan design, etc.) with over 80% accuracy using virtual simulations
Learners can structure the process of selecting optimal thermal management solutions in five or more stages based on experimental data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
